```{r}

shotsdata <- read.csv('../data/shots-data.csv')
shotsdata$name <- ''
shotsdata$name[1:371] <- "Iguodala"
shotsdata$name[372:949] <- "Green"
shotsdata$name[950:1864] <- "Durant"
shotsdata$name[1865:3084] <- "Thompson"
shotsdata$name[3085:nrow(shotsdata)] <- "Curry"

total_shots_by_player <- shotsdata %>%
group_by(name) %>%
select(name) %>%
summarise(total = n()) %>%
arrange(desc(total))
total_shots_by_player
```
